commit message:
Various improvements with Snackbar (now disappearing if we leave the Fragment)
Fixed a crash, if the user left the MapFragment after being located, but before the POI download ended
Bump to v0.0.7 (should have happened one commit earlier)

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Added the article image!!
It uses the Picasso lib to load and insert the image, with the app logo as a placeholder.
First implementation, so there are still things to improve...

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Went back to the 'normal' API URL, instead of the dev one
Also mini fixes, including removing an unused constant and dismissing both Snackbars when leaving the MapFragment

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Added LOTS of comments!
Also changed a bit a method.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Added error handling; if WJ API returns an error, it is displayed in the app.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Improved error detection

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Fixed a crash occuring if the Snackbars weren't displayed and the user left MapFragment

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Auto-hiding the keyboard when we switch between Fragments.
Also corrected tiny typos.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Added an onClick event on the Cards in the POIList view, that sends to the Wikipedia article

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Bump to v0.0.8

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>
